problem.markdown:
What percentage of students in the online lecture do you estimate answered they got the majority or all of their music from online? ( ) 11% ( ) 30% ( ) 50% (x) 68%
[explanation] The final statistics showed that 5% bought all their music, 7% ripped their music from their own CD's, 19% bought most of their music, 39% downloaded most of their music, and 29% downloaded all their music. [explanation]
problem.p: What percentage of students in the online lecture do you estimate answered they got the majority or all of their music from online?

div.p: The final statistics showed that 5% bought all their music, 7% ripped their music from their own CD's, 19% bought most of their music, 39% downloaded most of their music, and 29% downloaded all their music.
